Built By BodyWeight

Build your body using your own bodyweight...

BuiltByBodyweight was created with the aim of inspiring others to transform their bodies using just their own bodyweight as resistance, also known as calisthenics. Calisthenics is a fast growing area of fitness and that is for good reason, it is extremely effective at transforming your fitness.
Gyms have become synonymous with fitness but I and countless others are proof that a gym membership is not necessary to get into excellent shape. Cancel your gym membership right now and join us.

...Say goodbye to expensive gym memberships....
